author: sky.cactus
content:
<@415548822983278593> Would it be correct to summarize your feelings about our Twitter censorship discussion as follows:
1. Building censorship resistant financial software is high effort (`build_effort`) but, if successful, extremely effective in the fight against censorship (`build_effect`).
2. Quitting Twitter is low effort (`twitter_effort`), but has a tiny impact on the censorship of speech in the world (`twitter_effect`).
3. `build_effect / build_effort > twitter_effect / twitter_effort`
4. `twitter_effect / twitter_effort` doesn't cross your personal threshold of "things worth doing", but `build_effect / build_effort` does cross your personal threshold of "things worth doing".
